# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $200. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your lifestyle with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer
